thread.title: Wall Street may not be betting the right way on these stocks: Credit Suisse

title: Wall Street may not be betting the right way on these stocks: Credit Suisse
text:
CNBC.com Victor Virgile | Gamma-Rapho | Getty Images A model walks the runway at the Ralph Lauren Fall/Winter 2016 fashion show during New York Fashion Week on February 18, 2016 in New York City. 
There are still many stocks on Wall Street that have yet to receive the attention from investors they deserve, according to Credit Suisse. 
The bank released a research report called "Out on a Limb" on Thursday, including a collection of contrarian stock investment ideas. 
"This report identifies companies where our analysts stand apart from the consensus view, companies where our analysis reveals opportunities that the market has not yet priced in," Credit Suisse's equity research team wrote. 
The analysts included their theses for each suggestion as well as price targets and 12-month outlook. 
Here are three of their unusual picks.
